info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 9:21PM CDT until April 23 at 7:55AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls.
* WHEN...Until Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 49.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 43.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Monday was 49.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 49.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 49.2 feet on 04/01/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning at 1100 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING
